p: Benzoxazines are compounds consisting of a bicyclic group with an oxazine moiety. Maleopimaric acid imidophenol is a white, crystal solid. It can be synthesized from maleopimaric acid and 4-aminobenzoic phenol according to Scheme 20, prior to precipitation and drying [ 96]. It can be used in synthesis of benzoxazine monomers [ 96].
